playlists.name: Slayer
playlists.description: Work as a team of 4 to vanquish your opponents.

playlists.name: Team Arena
playlists.description: Face off against ranked teams of 4 in Slayer, Capture the Flag, Strongholds, and Oddball. Ground Pound and Spartan Charge are disabled. The Motion Sensor range is increased and only detects gunshots and Spartan Abilities.

playlists.name: Solo/Duo Queue Team Arena
playlists.description: Bring a friend or go it alone. Match with and against brave individuals in Slayer, Capture the Flag, Strongholds, and Oddball. All settings match those used in Team Arena.

playlists.name: Mythic Arena
playlists.description: Old meets new in this hybrid Arena experience!

playlists.name: 2v2 Competitive
playlists.description: Grab a partner and eliminate the opposing duo. Work together or die aloneâ€¦or die together.

playlists.name: SWAT
playlists.description: No shields, no motion tracker. Aim for the head!

playlists.name: Elimination
playlists.description: Survival is key! Work together to defeat your enemies in Breakout, Breakout 2.0, and Extermination!

playlists.name: Free-for-All
playlists.description: It's you against everyone else. Slay your way to victory!
